Package org.hazelwire.virtualmachine

Interface Summary
ProgressInterface Simple interface for updating the progress of something (currently only used for VMDownloader) in the frontend without connecting the backend with the frontend.
 

Class Summary
InstallScriptGenerator This class will generate an install script that is to be executed inside of the virtualmachine.
SSHConnection This class manages all the SSH communication with the virtualmachine in the generation process.
VMDownloader This class will download the virtualmachine (and basicly anything else) over HTTP.
VMHandler This class manages all the communication with the VirtualBox application.
VMLogger Crappy logger class will be deprecated very soon.
